body_html: Thanks Yarsolav, that may be it. I thought the forward pass would be smarter and discard intermediate computations or do them in-place when not needed for the backward pass, but thinking about it a bit more that may be hard to do with a framework as general as tf.
body_text: Thanks Yarsolav, that may be it. I thought the forward pass would be smarter and discard intermediate computations or do them in-place when not needed for the backward pass, but thinking about it a bit more that may be hard to do with a framework as general as tf.
body: Thanks Yarsolav, that may be it. I thought the forward pass would be smarter and discard intermediate computations or do them in-place when not needed for the backward pass, but thinking about it a bit more that may be hard to do with a framework as general as tf.
